dev.kkorolyov.sqlob.service

Class StatementGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.sqlob.service.StatementGenerator

  • public class StatementGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates SQL statements. Service class to be used exclusively by the persistence engine.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatementGenerator()
      Constructs a new statement generator using the default @{code Mapper}.
      StatementGenerator(Mapper mapper)
      Constructs a new statement generator.
